Nation: Nationality of the player.; First, we check our records in international play at senior level.; Then youth level.; Then citizenship presented on wikipedia.; Finally, we use their birthplace when available.
Pos: GK - Goalkeepers; DF - Defenders; MF - Midfielders; FW - Forwards; FB - Fullbacks; LB - Left Backs; RB - Right Backs; CB - Center Backs; DM - Defensive Midfielders; CM - Central Midfielders; LM - Left Midfielders; RM - Right Midfielders; WM - Wide Midfielders; LW - Left Wingers; RW - Right Wingers; AM - Attacking Midfielders;
Age: Age on date of match; Age is shown in YY-DDD format; Note: Ages are based on the player's age relative to UTC when the web page is first created. This may cause some issues where a player's age differs by one day from what you might expect
Performance_Sh: Shots Total; Does not include penalty kicks
Performance_SoT: Shots on target; Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Performance_Touches: Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass, then dribbling, then sending a pass counts as one touch
Performance_Press: Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving, carrying or releasing the ball
Performance_Blocks: Number of times blocking the ball by standing in its path
Expected_xG: Expected Goals; xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).; Provided by StatsBomb.; An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Expected_npxG: Non-Penalty Expected Goals; Provided by StatsBomb.; An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
Expected_xA: xG Assisted; xG which follows a pass that assists a shot; Provided by StatsBomb.; An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
SCA_SCA: Shot-Creating Actions; The two offensive actions directly leading to a shot, such as passes, dribbles and drawing fouls. Note: A single player can receive credit for multiple actions and the shot-taker can also receive credit.
SCA_GCA: Goal-Creating Actions; The two offensive actions directly leading to a goal, such as passes, dribbles and drawing fouls. Note: A single player can receive credit for multiple actions and the shot-taker can also receive credit.
Passes_Cmp%: Pass Completion Percentage; Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Passes_Prog: Progressive Passes; Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Carries_Carries: Number of times the player controlled the ball with their feet
Carries_Prog: Carries that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 5 yards, or any carry into the penalty area. Excludes carries from the defending 40% of the pitch
Total_Cmp%: Pass Completion Percentage; Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Total_TotDist: Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled in any direction
Total_PrgDist: Progressive Distance; Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled towards the opponent's goal. Note: Passes away from opponent's goal are counted as zero progressive yards.
Short_Cmp: Passes Completed; Passes between 5 and 15 yards
Short_Att: Passes Attempted; Passes between 5 and 15 yards
Short_Cmp%: Pass Completion Percentage; Passes between 5 and 15 yards; Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Medium_Cmp: Passes Completed; Passes between 15 and 30 yards
Medium_Att: Passes Attempted; Passes between 15 and 30 yards
Medium_Cmp%: Pass Completion Percentage; Passes between 15 and 30 yards; Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Long_Cmp: Passes Completed; Passes longer than 30 yards
Long_Att: Passes Attempted; Passes longer than 30 yards
Long_Cmp%: Pass Completion Percentage; Passes longer than 30 yards; Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
xA: xG Assisted; xG which follows a pass that assists a shot; Provided by StatsBomb.; An underline indicates there is a match that is missing data, but will be updated when available.
KP: Passes that directly lead to a shot (assisted shots)
1/3: Completed passes that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal; Not including set pieces
PPA: Completed passes into the 18-yard box; Not including set pieces
CrsPA: Completed crosses into the 18-yard box; Not including set pieces
Prog: Progressive Passes; Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Pass_Types_Dead: Dead-ball passes; Includes free kicks, corner kicks, kick offs, throw-ins and goal kicks
Pass_Types_TB: Completed pass sent between back defenders into open space
Pass_Types_Press: Passes made while under pressure from opponent
Pass_Types_Sw: Passes that travel more than 40 yards of the width of the pitch
Height_Low: Passes that leave the ground, but stay below shoulder-level
Height_High: Passes that are above shoulder-level at the peak height
Body_Parts_Other: Passes attempted using body parts other than the player's head or feet
Outcomes_Blocks: Blocked by the opponent who was standing it the path
Tackles_TklW: Tackles in which the tackler's team won possession of the ball
Vs_Dribbles_Att: Number of times dribbled past plus number of tackles
Vs_Dribbles_Tkl%: Percentage of dribblers tackled; Dribblers tackled divided by dribblers tackled plus times dribbled past; Minimum .625 dribblers contested per squad game to qualify as a leader
Vs_Dribbles_Past: Number of times dribbled past by an opposing player
Pressures_Press: Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving, carrying or releasing the ball
Pressures_Succ: Number of times the squad gained possession withing five seconds of applying pressure
Pressures_%: Successful Pressure Percentage; Percentage of time the squad gained possession withing five seconds of applying pressure; Minimum 6.44 pressures per squad game to qualify as a leader
Pressures_Def_3rd: Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving, carrying or releasing the ball, in the defensive 1/3
Pressures_Mid_3rd: Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving, carrying or releasing the ball, in the middle 1/3
Pressures_Att_3rd: Number of times applying pressure to opposing player who is receiving, carrying or releasing the ball, in the attacking 1/3
Blocks_Blocks: Number of times blocking the ball by standing in its path
Blocks_Sh: Number of times blocking a shot by standing in its path
Blocks_ShSv: Number of times blocking a shot that was on target, by standing in its path
Blocks_Pass: Number of times blocking a pass by standing in its path
Tkl+Int: Number of players tackled plus number of interceptions
Err: Mistakes leading to an opponent's shot
Touches_Touches: Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass, then dribbling, then sending a pass counts as one touch
Touches_Live: Live-ball touches. Does not include corner kicks, free kicks, throw-ins, kick-offs, goal kicks or penalty kicks
Dribbles_Succ%: Percentage of Dribbles Completed Successfully; Minimum .5 dribbles per squad game to qualify as a leader
Dribbles_Megs: Number of times a player dribbled the ball through an opposing player's legs
Carries_TotDist: Total distance, in yards, a player moved the ball while controlling it with their feet, in any direction
Carries_PrgDist: Progressive Distance; Total distance, in yards, a player moved the ball while controlling it with their feet towards the opponent's goal
Carries_1/3: Carries that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal
Carries_Mis: Number of times a player failed when attempting to gain control of a ball
Carries_Dis: Number of times a player loses control of the ball after being tackled by an opposing player. Does not include attempted dribbles
Receiving_Targ: Number of times a player was the target of an attempted pass
Receiving_Rec: Number of times a player successfully received a pass
Receiving_Rec%: Passes Received Percentage; Percentage of time a player successfully received a pass; Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Receiving_Prog: Progressive Passes Received; Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Performance_TklW: Tackles in which the tackler's team won possession of the ball
Aerial_Duels_Won%: Percentage of aerials won; Minimum .97 aerial duels per squad game to qualify as a leader
